Author: kittymiaou
Text: I'm currently recovering from bulimia and I was genuinely excited to be able to have a meal with my family for thanksgiving, but I got food poisoning and I got an IV and couldn't eat much at all without wanting to throw up. It made me realize how just five months ago this is probably something I would have wished to happen just so I dont get to eat, but in reality I was really hungry and I wasn't going to let my ed keep me from thinking that being sick was okay and no matter how loud my ed told me I can use it as an opportunity to continuously starve without anyone worrying. I wish u the best on ur recovery I know it's hard but it is achievable I'm proud of u with the baby steps u have taken (＾ｕ＾)

Author: almondbones
Text: I did the SAME exact thing; except my "bug" has been going on for four days of not eating.
